original: Jacobsson, Tor Harald, social vårds-syssloman, Jönköping, i. 22/6/90 i Sthlm. — Stud:res. i Sverige, Norge, Danmark o. England. Tj iman v. Gbgs’ iiat-tigv. 16-19, vik. assist, samt tf. förest, f. fattigv. v. barnav:avd. där, bitr. fat-tigv:- o. barnav ]konsul, samt sys:sil’om., sekr. o. omb :man h. Jönköp. stads fattigv :.styr. sed. 19. Ordf. i Småli-kretsen av Svies soc ivårdsfunktionä-rers riksförb. o. i fören. Sv:es soc:-vårdschefer, v. ordf. i arb :lösh :komm. i Jönköp. Skr.: Vägledn. v. und:-stödsberäkn. (26), Jönköp. fattigvård genom tiderna (28), Studier i eng. fi-lantropi (28), Några händelser ur den eng. fattigvårdens hist. (29), Undrsök-ningar ang. det soc. hjälpklientelet (34), De offentl. hjälporganens klientel (34), Om tattarna i Jönköp. (44) samt dessutom art., upps. o. d. i ,soc. ämnen i facktidskr. etc. Hobbies: humaniora.
translated: Jacobsson, Tor Harald, social welfare officer, Jönköping, born on 22/6/90 in Stockholm. He studied in Sweden, Norway, Denmark, and England. He worked as an employee at Gbgs' hospital from 1916-1919, serving as acting manager and deputy manager for the hospital's child welfare department, assisting with the management of the poor relief and child welfare department. He also served as a consultant for the poor and child welfare department, as well as a secretary and representative for the Jönköping city's poor relief board since 1919. He was the chairman of the Småli-circle of the Swedish national association of social welfare officers and the Swedish association of social welfare managers. In addition, he was the deputy chairman of the Jönköping unemployment commission. His written works include “Guidance for assistance benefits calculation” (1926), “Jönköping's poor relief over time” (1928), “Studies in English philanthropy” (1928), “Some events in the history of English poor relief” (1929), “Investigations concerning the social assistance client base” (1934), “The client base of public assistance organizations” (1934), “About the Tattars in Jönköping” (1944), as well as articles, essays, and studies in various professional journals related to social welfare issues. His hobbies were humanities. It is not mentioned whether he married or not.

structured.description: Tor Harald Jacobsson was a Swedish social welfare officer. He was born on 22nd June 1890 in Stockholm and studied in Sweden, Norway, Denmark, and England. He worked as an employee at Gbgs' hospital from 1916-1919, serving as acting manager and deputy manager for the hospital's child welfare department, assisting with the management of the poor relief and child welfare department. He also served as a consultant for the poor and child welfare department, as well as a secretary and representative for the Jönköping city's poor relief board since 1919. He was the chairman of the Småli-circle of the Swedish national association of social welfare officers and the Swedish association of social welfare managers. In addition, he was the deputy chairman of the Jönköping unemployment commission. His written works include “Guidance for assistance benefits calculation” (1926), “Jönköping's poor relief over time” (1928), “Studies in English philanthropy” (1928), “Some events in the history of English poor relief” (1929), “Investigations concerning the social assistance client base” (1934), “The client base of public assistance organizations” (1934), “About the Tattars in Jönköping” (1944), as well as articles, essays, and studies in various professional journals related to social welfare issues.
